Class Dalek

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • city.cs.engine.Walker
          • game.Dalek

  • public class Dalek
extends city.cs.engine.Walker
    Dalek character class. Also contains the methods for incrementing score and altering lives count

      • incrementLivesCount

        public void incrementLivesCount()
        Increments the livesCount variable by 1 and prints a message to the console

      • decrementLivesCount

        public void decrementLivesCount()
        Decreases the life count and plays the soundclip. Also, if the variable livesCount becomes 0, then it exits the program and prints a message 'Game Over' to the console
